head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GURFEIN, LOUIS J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GURFEIN, LOUIS J.

block.p: GURFEIN-Louis J. On September 29, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Ruthe Jacobs Gurfein, adoring father of Ronny Lynn Silbert and Stuart James Gurfein, cherished grandfather of Neal Harrison Silbert, Lillyanne Silbert, Elizabeth Marie Silbert, Scott Eric Gurfein, Heather Gill Gurfein and Kody Allana Gurfein. Services to be held graveside, October 2, at 2 PM, Mount Hebron Cemetery, Queens, NY. In lieu of flowers, please make donations to the American Cancer Society. The family will be receiving at 100 Birchall Drive, Scarsdale, NY, from Monday through Wednesday.
